venue.address_2: About 6 miles north of Jackson & south of Glen Boulder trail
venue.name: Rocky Branch Trailhead Parking Lot

item.description:
@ 14.6 miles via Rocky Branch Trail, Isolation Trail, Davis Path
@ 3,400 feet elevation gain
9:00 book time excluding stops
8:00 goal time including stops

Dogs are welcome!

If all goes according to plan, Larisa (aka LRIZ) will complete a goal of hiking all NH48 peaks in each of the 4 seasons in 2009. Wow! Come join in the fun!

We will meet at the Rocky Branch trailhead on Rte 16 at 8:15 AM and will be on the trail promptly at 8:30 AM.

Most likely we will take the Engine Hill bushwhack - we may expereince high water conditions due to the recent rain and warm weather.

This will be a fast paced hike with limited stops!

There will be 1 or more bushwhacks during the hike.


**** Special Notes ****
We may find Winter conditions. It is your responsibility be knowledgeble on the planned route, use of map and compass, and proper gear. This event is strenuous in nature. Traction devices such as Microspikes or crampons are recommended. Snowshoes are recommended. Please arrive early and be ready to ascend at the specified time.

If you have any questions please ask. DO NOT assume anything.
item.how_to_find_us: I will be in a green Suburban with NH plates and ROT & VFTT decals
item.name: Isolation - Advanced due to terrain & pace
